docs: I was not impressed, average room average condition, staff not that attentive. Probably won't stay again. This was my first stay at this hotel in this city, and i will look for options. The front desk receptionist was not very engaging. </DOC> We stay at Marriott a lot, but to be honest I was a little disappointed. I know, a Marriott, you say. But the beds were really uncomfortable and the pillows skimpy and hard. Wonder when they last changed the mattresses. The décor was nice and very clean. The front desk had two gals chewing gum like Laverne and Shirley. Walking distance to restaurants but the pool was tiny. Breakfast was average, nothing special, really; just your average hotel breakfast. Man, I wish some hotel would come up with a "treat " once in a while. </DOC> Great, quiet, well maintained property. This was a godsend on a long cross country trip. Marriott points made it even better, but I would have paid the rate they were advertising in a heart beat. Well worth the stop.
summary:
Overpriced for a hotel in downtown Phoenix.  We went last Friday, and it was not nearly as fast as Gradville, we booked for 7 hrs and they don't fill our request.  So, the problem is... no matter of the time you decide what to get.  

Besides that it was just mediocre. But for $89,WITH, I felt content at this hotel.  Now, with Dave and Buster I get a loyal customer, and this the closest home tavern has to offer. I have always had a pleasant experience.</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
